Momo Wandel Soumah (1926 - June 15, 2003) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-akpọ saxophon si Guinea, nke a na-amata site na ọlụ ya.

Soumah malitere n'afọ ndị 1950 na-egwu n'òtù ịgba egwu, mana ọ kwagara na egwu Guinea nke oge a na-esote mgbanwe ọdịbendị. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Syli Orchestra nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu (nke bụ Syli Orchestre National) nke e guzobere n'okpuru ntụziaka nke onye isi ala mbụ a họpụtara bụ Sekou Toure

A họpụtara otu ndị egwu Guinea ka ha gaa njem na Guinea niile ma kpalie ma nye ndị egwu ntụziaka gafee mba ahụ ma nyere aka guzobe ndị egwu mpaghara bụ isi ihe na mmemme 'Authenticité' nke Sekou Toure iji kwalite ma gbasaa egwu ọdịnala 'ezi' nke Guinea mgbe ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị gasịrị. Site n'etiti afọ 1980 Soumah mepụtara ngwakọta jazz na egwu ọdịnala Afrịka.
Ọ nwụrụ na mberede na June 15, 2003. N'oge ọnwụ ya, Soumah bụ onye nduzi egwụ nke Circus Baobab
